# op decoder
0000011001 00011000010011010 # 1 LOAD
0000011010 00011010000011000 # 2 LOAD
0000011011 01011001101011000 # 3 LOAD

0010011001 00010000010000010 # 1 OP-IMM
0010011010 01010000001000000 # 2 OP-IMM

0010111001 00001000000000000 # 1 AUIPC
0010111010 01001000001000000 # 2 AUIPC

0011011001 00010000010000010 # 1 OP-IMM-32
0011011010 01010000001000000 # 2 OP-IMM-32

0100011001 00011000010000010 # 1 STORE
0100011010 00011010010100100 # 2 STORE
0100011011 01011000100000000 # 3 STORE

0110011001 00110000010000010 # 1 OP
0110011010 00110000010100100 # 2 OP
0110011011 01110000001000000 # 3 OP

0110111001 01000000001010000 # 1 LUI

1100011001 00001000010000010 # 1 BRANCH
1100011010 00001100010100100 # 2 BRANCH
1100011011 11001100000000000 # 3 BRANCH

1100111001 00010000010001010 # 1 JALR
1100111010 11010000001001000 # 2 JALR

1101111001 00001000000001000 # 1 JAL
1101111010 11001000001001000 # 2 JAL

1110011xxx 00000000000000000 # xxx SYSTEM

xxxxxxx000 00000001100000001 # 0 INSTR
